drilling.title: Precision borehole program
drilling.description: Permitting, drilling, and on-site testing for a sanitary, long-lived water source tailored to your parcel.
deliverables: Hydro-geologic parcel walk and permit brief
Cased borehole up to 30 m with food-grade piping
Two-year mechanical warranty with first service visit
cornerCases: Granite shelves or boulder fields require dual-rotary rig planning
Driveways narrower than 2.7 m call for compact track rigs or matting
Septic tanks or drains trigger minimum 15 m offsets and lab testing

maintenance.title: Flow protection care plan
maintenance.description: Scheduled flushing, pump diagnostics, and filtration swaps that keep yields stable year-round.
deliverables: Pump performance diagnostics with telemetry logs
Filter media swap plus debris extraction
Updated maintenance record for warranty continuity
cornerCases: Iron-heavy water needs staged flushing to avoid staining
Abandoned wells nearby can contaminate flow and must be sealed
Seasonal shutdowns require glycol purge to protect lines

installation.title: Turnkey installation stack
installation.description: Pump, piping, power, and monitoring components delivered to your utility room or mechanical pad.
deliverables: Submersible pump sizing, wiring, and controller install
Insulated supply line trenched to structure with backfill restoration
Pressure tank, filtration stack, and smart monitoring setup
Commissioning checklist with homeowner handoff kit
cornerCases: Existing interior plumbing may need dielectric isolation
Frost-depth deeper than 1.2 m requires heat trace or vaults
Solar or off-grid loads add battery planning and backup storage

scenarios.title: Real-world scenarios we solve weekly
scenarios.summary: These engagements come up constantly in Latvia and the Baltics, so we built repeatable playbooks for each.

rockyTerrain.title: Rocky, uneven parcels
rockyTerrain.body: When soil reports read like granite poetry, we bring rigs that chew through layered geology without tearing up the yard.
bullets: Pre-rig site mats keep slopes intact and prevent rutting
Percussion plus rotary heads handle mixed till and boulders
Real-time telemetry logs depth, torque, and pressure

seasonalUsage.title: Seasonal homes and cabins
seasonalUsage.body: Designed for properties that sit dormant part of the year but must deliver potable water the moment you arrive.
bullets: Freeze-proof routing keeps lines pressurized all winter
Smart controllers auto-cycle pumps during off-season
Remote alerts ping caretakers before anything freezes

retrofit.title: Retrofit of legacy wells
retrofit.body: Inherited wells or DIY installs get modernized with proper casing, monitoring, and safe discharge.
bullets: Downhole camera inspections reveal collapsed liners
Sleeving and sanitary sealing stop surface intrusion
Tie-in manifolds integrate with interior plumbing
